user.title: Welcome to HASS AI
user.description:
You are about to set up HASS AI, an integration designed to bring a new level of intelligence to your smart home. Its goal is to automatically understand which of your devices are most important for home automation.

After this initial setup, a new "HASS AI" panel will be added to your sidebar. From there, you can run a scan to see how the AI has weighted your entities and then override its suggestions to perfectly match your needs.

**Local Agent**: Uses Home Assistant's built-in conversation agent (no API key required)
**OpenAI/Gemini**: External AI providers (API key required)
